title: Audio feed  continues  while the  autoplaying  video is muted
custom_preconds: Given:  User has disabled video autoplay on a Team page
custom_steps:
When the user has launched an MLB audio feed
And then views a team page,
custom_expected: Then the MLB audio feed should continue to play while the autoplaying video is disabled

title: Given:  User has enabled video autoplay on a  Team pageAutoplaying  video’s audio  overtakes the  focus
custom_preconds: Given:  User has enabled video autoplay on a Team page
custom_steps: When the user unmutes the autoplaying video
custom_expected: Then the MLB audio stops, and the autoplaying video’s audio overtakes the focus

title: Launches  audio from an non-MLB app; then views a  page on MLB  where video autoplaying; non-MLB  app’s audio  continues
custom_preconds: Given:  User has launched audio from a non-MLB app
custom_steps: When the user views a Team page in the MLB app where there is video autoplaying
custom_expected: Then the non-MLB app’s audio should continue to play while the autoplaying video is muted

title: Autoplaying  Non-MLB audio  overtakes the  focus from a  Team page
custom_preconds: Given:  User has enabled video autoplay on a Team page
custom_steps: When the user unmutes the autoplaying video
custom_expected: Then the non-MLB audio stops, and the Team Page video’s audio overtakes the focus

title: Selected audio should be heard  when video autoplay is disabled
custom_preconds: Given:  User has disabled video autoplay on a Team page
custom_steps: When the user is listening to a selected MLB Audio feed
custom_expected: Then the selected MLB Audio feed should continue to be heard
